column5: Hi folks: A friend asked me about lodges on Lake Simcoe, Ontario for both ice and summer fishing trips. I've never been there, but I told him I might be able to get some recommendations. It will be a father and 14-year-old son duo. Any suggestions on good places to stay?
Try eaglewood resort--1-705-437-1634 or big ed's--1-905-722-5410
